ygData.subject: RE: Trade
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, I traded the runed cowl I got for a Mith BP and a MM battle drum. LOTS of items required to get a full set of lambent, but even if you went and
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
>
> so what do you think of the full
> lambent set for a
> runed cowl trade? my guild was split on the subject, as i was.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard


Hmm, I traded the runed cowl I got for a Mith BP and a MM battle drum. LOTS
of items required to get a full set of lambent, but even if you went and
re-camped it all I think you could get the set replaced before you could the
froggie decided to drop another cowl.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 44 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
